title: Modify AI plugin for per-user API key support
acceptance_criteria: In handle(): before LLM call, check getUserApiKey(userId)
If user has API key: create temporary LLMClient with user's key for that request only
If user has default_model set: use it instead of config default
Original shared LLM client remains unchanged for users without custom keys
Logging indicates when using user's custom key (without logging the key itself)
